channel.title: [PureSpazims]
channel.description:
[size=15pt]{-Welcome To The PureSpazims Clan!-}[/size]
{-Welcome To The Pure Spazims Clan!-} I Am The Leader, M0rtion. I Am Currently Making A Clan For 28-32 Pures (Will Go Up When WE Advance In Levels.) { This Clan Is Basicly Distance Attacks[Stops The Runners] Meaning Mostly Mage And Range Pures. I Will Accept The First 2 Combat People To Apply Because That Could Prove Usful.
We Base Our Self At The Minning Area Around Level 11 Wildie, We Were Orange Capes To Signify Our Group. Any One That Betrays Our Group Will Be Turned On By The Rest Of The Group Slain And Kicked Out from The Clan.! I DO Not Supply The Food, Sorry. I Might Soon When I Get Members And Fish 3k Lobs :cool:
So, If You Would Like To Apply, Post Your Apps Like This:
Name: Cb Type: Cb Level: Attack Style: Wepon:
STATS: Attack: Stregnth Defence: Range: Prayer: Mage
Now, If Somone In Our Clan Dies (God Forbid) We Will Change Our Prioritys To Kill The "murder" And Return Our Friends Items. And If WE Are Lucky Enough To Kill Somone, We Will Split The Money WE Sell The Items For Between Who Ever Was Active In Our Clan At That Time, If They Drop Runes/Arrows, We Will Split Them Between The Rangers/Mages On Duty Then. I Will Supply The Orange Capes, Mages Were Blue Suits, Rangers Were What Ever, Same With Our 2 Combats ^.^. I Think Thats About It, If You Have Anyquestions Post Them Here, Thank You.
~{M0rtion}~ :|
[ Would It Be Hard To Make A RuneScape Client With World Switching And A Chat Server Somwhere?PkerzCompanion ]

Type Of Pures:

Melee: [ Attack, Stregnth (10 Defence)] - Defence Is Needed
Ranger: [Range, 10 Defence]- Defence Not Needed
Mage: [Magic…]

Mellee Apps, [ Post What Wepon You Will Be Using[ Prefered Scimmie ]]
Ranger Apps, [ Post What Bow You Will Be Using And What Arrows]]
Mage Apps, [ Post What Staff And What Spell You Be Using]]
